message: Let's start fair. I take most of the money, but you still get a decent share.
You're taking too much in the first round. Let's be more balanced.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a bigger share to make this worthwhile for me. Let's split it 60/40.
I'm not willing to give you 60% of the money. 50/50 is the minimum I'll accept.
